document.full_text: mitt romney is the leading choice among new hampshire republicans as their party's 2012 presidential nominee, but most still have no idea who will get their first-in-the-nation primary vote in february, a survey showed on monday.
document.title: new hampshire republicans lean to romney, most undecided
lines_and_colors: mitt romney is the leading choice among new hampshire republicans as their party's 2012 presidential nominee, but most still have no idea who will get their first-in-the-nation primary vote in february, a survey showed on monday.
